entry.title: Interview with Christopher Rufo: What Are His Core Beliefs and Goals Regardig Race and LGBT Debates?

media:group.media:title: Interview with Christopher Rufo: What Are His Core Beliefs and Goals Regardig Race and LGBT Debates?
media:group.media:description:
Original video on Rumble: https://rumble.com/v1ahvia-interview-with-christopher-rufo-what-are-his-core-beliefs-and-goals.html
Whether one agrees or disagrees with his work, there is no denying that the writer, documentarian, and activist Chris Rufo has had an extremely significant impact on our political discourse, debates and even our laws. Even large liberal outlets which seek to demonize him -- such as the New Yorker and New York Times -- acknowledge the immensely consequential nature of his work, especially on debates about what is taught in schools about race and LGBT issues. With this significance in mind, I spoke to Rufo about his core worldview and the goals of his political work. It was a spirited and in-depth discussions that focused on some of our differences and the questions many have about his aspirations.

media:group.media:description:
Journalist Glenn Greenwald took part in a panel during the VII SalÃ£o do Livro PolÃ­tico in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil, and was asked to comment on the case against Julian Assange.
Watch the interview with Stella Morris Assange: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qdNCE41k_i0
Glenn was in SÃ£o Paulo to launch the Brazilian edition of his latest book, which can be ordered here: https://autonomialiteraria.com.br/loja/reportagem/em-defesa-da-democracia-minha-batalha-por-justica-e-liberdade-de-expressao-no-pais-da-lava-jato/ The US Edition, titled Securing Democracy, is available here: https://www.haymarketbooks.org/books/1634-securing-democracy

entry.title: WATCH: Lawyer Stella Assange, wife of Julian, interviewed by David Miranda [LEGENDADO EM PORTUGUÃŠS]

media:group.media:title: WATCH: Lawyer Stella Assange, wife of Julian, interviewed by David Miranda [LEGENDADO EM PORTUGUÃŠS]
media:group.media:description:
IN ENGLISH, WITH PORTUGUESE SUBTITLES
Original Rumble Video: https://rumble.com/v17tex8-watch-david-miranda-talks-to-stella-assange-about-julians-case.html
On Tuesday in Brazil, the country celebrated Press Freedom Day. Assange has become a national hero in Brazil, with politicians across the spectrum urging his freedom and condemning the ongoing US/UK attempt to imprison him for life under the Espionage Act. My husband David Miranda, a member of the Brazilian Congress, spoke to Assange's wife about the recent developments in the case, what people are the world can do to help Assange, and the toll it has taken on his health and his family.

entry.title: The Typhoid Mary of Disinformation: Nicolle Wallace

media:group.media:title: The Typhoid Mary of Disinformation: Nicolle Wallace
media:group.media:description:
Our mini-documentary on Nicolle Wallace's extraordinary record is now available for viewing on our Substack: https://greenwald.substack.com/p/the-typhoid-mary-of-disinformation?s=w. This trailer, by Matt Orfalea, is here, and he also produced the full video.
From her days as a professional liar for the Bush/Cheney White House and 2004 campaign, now as a beloved-by-liberals MSNBC host, Nicolle Wallace has for two decades been the Typhoid Mary of Disinformation. Nobody spreads official campaigns of deceit and lies more casually, frequently, aggressively or destructively than she.

media:group.media:title: House Democratic Majority Leader Steny Hoyer (D-MD): "We're at War!"
media:group.media:description: The 82-year-old Maryland Democrat, in his 20th term, presumably means the U.S. is at war with Russia, which appears to be one of the most significant announcements in years.

entry.title: WashPost's Doxing of @LibsOfTikTok Reveals Who Corporate Journalists See as Their Targets

media:group.media:title: WashPost's Doxing of @LibsOfTikTok Reveals Who Corporate Journalists See as Their Targets
media:group.media:description:
Original video on Rumble: https://rumble.com/v11n4sn-taylor-lorenzs-doxxing-of-libsoftiktok-reveals-who-corporate-journalists-se.html
Trump-era corporate journalism ceased viewing real power centers as adversaries (CIA/NSA/FBI/WallSt). The real enemy are citizens with the wrong politics. Rather than confront real power centers, the largest and richest media corporations - eg, the Bezos-owned WPost - allied with those factions and attack citizens.
The 2018 CNN obscenity featured in this video is most illustrative: they confronted an old lady with a tiny pro-Trump FB page on her yard. We recall when CNN threatened to dox someone who made an anti-CNN meme and when the Daily Beast published dirt and the real name of someone who published a video making Nancy Pelosi look drunk.
This is the key lesson of the latest tawdry episode with the WashPost's Taylor Lorenz: ever since a Trump presidency became a possibility, the largest liberal media corporations - over and over - have used their vast resources to target and punish private citizens for the wrong politics.

entry.title: Media Refuses to Retract their "Russian Disinformation" Lie Even as NYT & WP Authenticate the Emails

media:group.media:title: Media Refuses to Retract their "Russian Disinformation" Lie Even as NYT & WP Authenticate the Emails
media:group.media:description:
Original Rumble video is here: https://rumble.com/vz3x6n-nyt-and-wp-confirm-biden-archive-yet-the-media-refuse-to-retract-their-russ.html
We examine one of the worst media disinformation campaigns in modern U.S. political history. In the weeks before the 2020 election, most corporate outlets spread the CIA lie that the materials on the Hunter Biden laptop -- which raised questions about the activities of front-runner Joe Biden in Ukraine and China -- were "Russian disinformation," meaning that the documents were fake and were forged by Russia. It was clear from the start that the archive was real and they were lying. But even now that the New York Times, the Washington Post and a Politico reporter have all authenticated the archive, these media outlets that spread that destructive lie refuse to retract it or acknowledge this proof.

entry.title: John Pilger interviews former CIA Latin America chief Duane Clarridge, 2015

media:group.media:title: John Pilger interviews former CIA Latin America chief Duane Clarridge, 2015
media:group.media:description: For those who believe in the whole thing about how the US fights for freedom and democracy or whatever, there was a time when CIA -- before it openly integrated into the newsrooms of media corporations like NBC and CNN -- was candid about its real mission. Listen for yourself as journalist John Pilger interviews former CIA Latin America chief Duane Clarridge about how easily and happily the CIA overthrew democratically elected governments whenever it wanted.

entry.title: The War in Ukraine and the Glaring Omissions in Discourse about It

media:group.media:title: The War in Ukraine and the Glaring Omissions in Discourse about It
media:group.media:description:
Glenn and Q. discuss how the US media treats this is as the first war to ever occur, and how this lack of memory leads to a lopsided view of what's happening and an unjustified moral righteousness by the US.
Watch the full episode "But We Think The Price Is Worth It": https://www.callin.com/episode/but-we-think-the-price-is-worth-it-GUAZiDQmjD
More clips from Unredacted: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTOGhJnuFdcnnO0TMQwZQWg
Unredacted is broadcast live on the Callin app every Thursday. Download the app to join the conversation: https://www.callin.com
